<style>

/* Style the cards */
  .card {
    box-shadow: 0 4px 8px 0 rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2);
    max-width: 100%;
    margin: auto;
    text-align: center;
    font-family: arial;
    border-radius: 10px;
    box-shadow: 0 4px 8px 0 rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2);
    overflow: hidden;
  }

  .title {
    color: grey;
    font-size: 30px;
  }

  button {
    border: none;
    outline: 0;
    display: inline-block;
    padding: 8px;
    color: white;
    background-color: #000;
    text-align: center;
    cursor: pointer;
    width: 100%;
    font-size: 30px;
  }

  a {
    text-decoration: none;
    font-size: 22px;
    color: black;
  }

  button:hover, a:hover {
    opacity: 0.7;
  }

_______________________________________________

  /* Style the carousel container */
  .carousel {
    width: 600px;
    margin: 0 auto;
    overflow: hidden;
    position: relative;
  }

  /* Style the carousel slides */
  .carousel-slide {
    display: flex;
    width: 100%;
    height: 300px;
  }

  

  /* Style the card header */
  .card-header {
    padding: 10px;
    background-color: #f0f0f0;
    text-align: center;
    font-family: arial;
    font-size: 18px;
    font-weight: bold;
  }

  /* Style the card image */
  .card-image {
    width: 100%;
    height: 150px;
    object-fit: cover;
  }

  /* Style the card text */
  .card-text {
    padding: 10px;
    font-family: arial;
    font-size: 14px;
  }

  /* Style the buttons */
  .button {
    width: 50px;
    height: 50px;
    border: none;
    border-radius: 50%;
    background-color: white;
    color: black;
    font-size: 30px;
    cursor: pointer;
    position: absolute;
    top: 50%;
    transform: translateY(-50%);
  }

  .button-prev {
    left: 10px;
  }

  .button-next {
    right: 10px;
  }
</style>
